Question: This person's energy and spirit helped him out-compete Roger Mudd for the anchor spot on the Evening News.
Hints: This person appears in the 2008 award-winning documentary Boogie Man: The Lee Atwater Story.
This person reported that U.S President John F Kennedy had been assassinated in Dallas.
For much of his career, this person has been the target of critics who have accused him of having a liberal bias.
